concept.title: EMM and ESM cause code mapping enhancements (Feature f10119-02)
concept.shortdesc: This feature introduces enhancements for EMM and ESM cause code mapping.

conbody.p: This feature introduces customized EMM and ESM cause code mapping enhancements for the following cases:

li.p: When the MME does not receive response from the HSS during attach or TAU procedure and the Attach Reject message is sent to the UE. The customized cause code is sent to the UE so that the UE can retry the attach. This enhances NAS EMM cause codes for Diameter codes diamNasMappingProfile.

When the MME receives #92 Create Session Response Reject from the S-GW, the EMM cause code is re-mapped to network failure. And when the MME receives S11 Create Session Response with cause code #92 user authentication failed, the MME maps it to ESM cause code #33 Requested service option not subscribed. This enhances feature Provisionable EMM and ESM cause code values (f10403-01).
